title: 随机行走
author: ruhuasiyu
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ruhuasiyu 于 2016-8-14 08:16 编辑 

先在起始地点召唤名为 move 的盔甲架
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {CustomName:"move",NoGravity:1}复制代码在十字区域放置四个名为 rod 的盔甲架
summon armor_stand ~ ~ ~ {CustomName:"rod",NoGravity:1}复制代码分别接上四条移动命令
execute @e[name=move] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[name=move] ~ ~ ~1
execute @e[name=move] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[name=move] ~ ~ ~-1
execute @e[name=move] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[name=move] ~1 ~ ~
execute @e[name=move] ~ ~ ~ tp @e[name=move] ~-1 ~ ~复制代码中间再接
execute @e[name=move] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~ ~ sea_lantern复制代码再依次放置两个命令方块，第一个为循环型，接上开关，第二个为连锁型
execute @r[type=armor_stand,name=rod] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~-1 ~ redstone_block
execute @e[type=armor_stand,name=rod] ~ ~ ~ setblock ~ ~-1 ~ air 0
复制代码
